title: Running on empty
creator_credit: John Clark, Mark Egerton, Pom Oliver and Film Corporation of Western Australia
brief_description: A young man, Mike, has an obsession with cars and someone else’s girlfriend. The film concentrates on his struggle to win her, and survive the challenge of her mean boyfriend to a series of illegal street races. Cast includes Deborah Conway, Max Cullen and Richard Moir.
